title: São Pedro (Forte de)
body:
It was located at the eastern end of the old Praça Académica and began to be demolished on September 20, 1897, by authorization of the Ministry of War. Its construction was completed in 1707, as stated by an inscription that was on the fort's gate and was transcribed on page 629 of the notes to Saudades da Terra.

The São Pedro fort was also known by the name Forte Novo.

1897: Year in which the demolition of the São Pedro Fort began
